item.title: Judge Dismisses Newsmax Lawsuit Against Fox News as ‘Shotgun Pleading’
item.description: Two days after it was filed, Judge Aileen Cannon has dismissed an antitrust lawsuit against Fox News, in which rival Newsmax accused it of using its market power to stifle competition. Cannon, an appo

item.title: Fox News Has Millions More Viewers Than Any Rival. Did It Play Hardball to Get There?
item.description: Newsmax filed a lawsuit claiming that the Lachlan Murdoch-run news giant blocks competitors by coercing pay TV operators, threatening steep financial penalties if they add Newsmax.
